page.title: 13PLAYGROUND GAME..WALL HE
page.content:
EDUCATION This is a gamethe children play at Bentworth school.To play Wall He,you get alot of people,and someone is 'it'.The person who is 'it' counts to 10 while the other people run off.When you have counted to 10 you run and catch people.When you catch someone they go to the wall and stand and put 1 hand on the wall and hold the other arm out straight.Someone else who is running (but not 'it') can go and touch the persons arm then they are free.After a while you can change the person who is 'it' for another person.
by Jenny.
